token_info.name: T-minus ∞ (gen.4 2048|0.0|1.0)
token_info.description: An allegory of the human-machine relation and their unavoidable progression towards the singularity.   A generative piece depicting entropy through recursive cellular-automaton based growth.  Platform : js/WebGL Size : Resolution variable ( ideal 2048x2048 ) Pixel density : 2048x2048  Running on seed 0.0.1.0  This is gen.4 of T-minus ∞ series.  If sold, a gen.5 will be released with a new seed and price doubled.
